Constructor Detail

AllPanel

public AllPanel(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                CAFrame caFrame)
Creates a panel of the specified height and width.

Parameters:
frame - The JFrame to which this panel is being added.
caFrame - The cellular automata's frame.
